entry.title: New release for Medama: v0.3.0
entry.content:
Features

Improved Dashboard Experience

  • Mobile-Friendly Design: The dashboard now adapts to smaller screens, improving usability on mobile devices and tablets.

  • Direct Referrer Access: Select referrer domains with a new button when selecting a referrer URL on the summary page.

  • Summary Percentages: Hover over data rows on the summaries page to see visitor or duration percentages relative to totals.

Developer-Friendly API Documentation

  • OpenAPI Release: Full API endpoint descriptions are now available here letting developers easily integrate their personal or professional dashboards to this project.

Bug Fixes and Improvements

Simplified Filtering

  • Case-insensitive filters for more convenient data querying
  • Prevention of duplicate filter entries

Improved Queries:

  • More accurate time-on-page calculations, requiring 3+ data points per path
  • Referrer data now based on unique visitors instead of all page views

Tracker Optimisations

  • Prevent duplicate page views from being sent due to History API usage.
  • Reduced likelihood of load events failing to be sent due to third-party extensions.

  • fix(tracker): duplicate events on different query parameters by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/56
  • docs: add screenshot to readme by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/57
  • fix: update time queries to be more consistent by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/58
  • fix(tracker): use fetch on load event by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/59
  • fix(dashboard): remove timezone selector when adding website by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/60
  • fix(dashboard): prevent duplicate filters by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/61
  • fix(core): make filtering case-insensitive by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/62
  • fix(tracker): use fetch on unload as well by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/63
  • feat(dashboard): initial mobile responsiveness by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/64
  • fix(dashboard): make time period selector more responsive by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/66
  • fix(dashboard): use previous period instead of yesterday for tooltips by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/67
  • feat(dashboard): select referrer via external button by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/68
  • docs: clean up spec for autogenerated docs by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/65
  • fix(core): referrers should use unique visitors by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/69

entry.title: New release for Medama: v0.4.0
entry.content:
Features

Data Grouping

  • Referrer Groups - Known referrer URLs are now conveniently grouped together for easier identification.
  • Selecting a referrer group allows you to expand and view the URLs within that specific group.

  • Language Groups - Languages are also now grouped and can be expanded to display specific browser locales.

System Resources

  • New Usage Dashboard - Useful for users with remote-hosted VMs, this dashboard gives insights into the application's resource usage. It also includes options to adjust database resource allocation.

Bug Fixes and Improvements

  • Website Deletion: Users can now delete websites directly from the dashboard.
  • Improved Caching: Improved caching for dashboard assets and scripts to load the dashboard quicker.
  • Better Bot Detection: Upgraded user-agent parser for more accurate bot detection.
  • Dashboard Interaction: Fixed several bugs related to filter interactions on the dashboard.

What's Changed

  • feat: add system resources dashboard by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/72
  • perf(core): add etag caching for assets by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/73
  • feat(dashboard): add the ability to delete a website by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/74
  • fix(core): improve bot user agent coverage by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/75
  • feat: add language group locales by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/76
  • feat: add referrer groups by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/80

Full Changelog: https://github.com/medama-io/medama/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

entry.title: New release for Medama: v0.4.2
entry.content:
Bug Fixes and Improvements

  • Corrected bounce rate calculations for accuracy, as they were previously much lower than expected.
  • Improved reliability of unload event tracking by using sendBeacon API.
  • Many minor dashboard enhancements related to formatting, styling, and accessibility.

What's Changed

  • refactor(core): use custom duckdb query builder by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/83

entry.title: New release for Medama: v0.4.3
entry.content:
Release Notes

Features

  • Added support for Docker ARM64 images.
  • New website quick switcher on the dashboard.

Bug Fixes and Improvements

  • Chart tooltips now clearly indicate the specific range of data they cover.
  • Fixed an issue where monthly interval queries were returning zero data.
  • Trackers on multi-page applications now properly send unload events.
  • Optimised the tracker bundle size in brotli compression scenarios.

Community

  • Join Our Discord: We now have a Discord server where we share ongoing progress and updates about this project. Feel free to join and connect with us at medama.io/discord.

What's Changed

  • ci: add arm docker images by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/90
  • ci: skip using qemu for building arm images by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/91
  • ci(docker): remove node and reduce layers by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/92
  • feat(dashboard): add website quick switch dropdown by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/93
  • fix: correct monthly interval querying and chart tooltips dates by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/94
  • fix(tracker): use event listener on window instead of document by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/95
  • perf(tracker): smaller size through direct function passing by @ayuhito in https://github.com/medama-io/medama/pull/96

Full Changelog: https://github.com/medama-io/medama/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3
